Package au.csiro.pathling.security.ga4gh

Class PassportScopeEnforcer

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.csiro.pathling.QueryExecutor
      • au.csiro.pathling.security.ga4gh.PassportScopeEnforcer
  • public class PassportScopeEnforcer
extends au.csiro.pathling.QueryExecutor
    A component that can filter a dataset of resources based on the passport scope of the current request.
    Author:
    John Grimes

        Parameters:
        configuration - a QueryConfiguration object to control the behaviour of the executor
        fhirContext - a FhirContext for doing FHIR stuff
        sparkSession - a SparkSession for resolving Spark queries
        dataSource - a Database for retrieving resources
        terminologyServiceFactory - a TerminologyServiceFactory for resolving terminology queries
        passportScope - a request-scoped PassportScope that provides the filters that need to be applied
